casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nicolas Olivares PINEDA. No. 70P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2016. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Pineda, Nicolas Olivares.

James R. Glover, Chapel Hill.

Scott T. Stroud, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of March 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of March 2016."
